result.reason: Already implemented — RDPDesktopScaleFactor (100/125/150/200/Auto) exists in connection properties, SmartSize also available for client-side scaling
result.approach: No fix needed; feature already exists via DesktopScaleFactor connection property and SmartSize resolution option

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is a feature request from 2018 about DPI/scaling on remote RDP sessions. The codebase already has `RDPDesktopScaleFactor` with Scale100/125/150/200/Auto options and full DPI handling in `RdpProtocol.cs`. This feature already exists in the current fork.
